parameters.functionCode:
let mailCase = $node["Webhook"].json["body"]["trigger"]["body"]["case"]; let mailText = ""; let mailSubject = ""; switch(mailCase){ case 1: mailText = `Dear ${$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["trigger"]["body"]["config"]["approver_name"]},

`+ `You have received a new request to approve the set of codes that have been created by the ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name}

`+ `Kindly review the details provided below:

`+ `Request Details:
`+ `${$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["table_html"]}
`+ `Requestor's Name: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name}
`+ `Total Codes: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.links_count}
`+ `Total Value: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.campaign_value}

`+ `To take action on this request, please log in to the portal using the following link: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_link}

`+ `Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated.

`+ `Best regards,

`+ `Team ShakePe`; mailSubject = "Action Required: Codes Approval Request" break; case 2: mailText = `Dear ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_name},

`+ `We are writing to inform you that the codes request, which was previously reviewed and approved by ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_name} , is now awaiting your final approval.

`+ `Kindly review the details provided below:

`+ `Request Details:
`+ `${$node["Webhook"].json["body"]["table_html"]}
`+ `Requestor's Name: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name}
`+ `Total Codes: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.links_count}
`+ `Total Value: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.campaign_value}
`+ `Approverâ€™s Name: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_name}

`+ `To take action on this request, please log in to the portal using the following link: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_link}

`+ `Your prompt attention to this matter would be greatly appreciated.

`+ `Best regards,

`+ `Team ShakePe` mailSubject="Action Required: Codes Approval Request - Final Approval" break; case 3: mailText= `Dear ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name},

`+ `Your request (${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_id}) has been reviewed and approved by ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_name} and now your request is pending final approval from our admin, ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.admin_name}.

`+ `We will keep you informed of any updates and actions taken by the admin.

`+ `Best regards,

`+ `Team ShakePe` mailSubject= `Update on Your Codes Request (${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_id})` break; case 4: mailText=`Dear ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name},

`+ `We regret to inform you that your request has been reviewed by ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_name}, and unfortunately, it has been declined.

`+ `Comments: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_comments}

`+ `If you have any questions or would like to discuss the feedback in more detail, please reach out to the ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.approver_name}.

` + `Best regards,

`+ `Team ShakePe` mailSubject=`Decline of New Codes Request (${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_id})` break; case 5: mailText = `Dear ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name},

`+ `Your codes request has been reviewed and approved by our admin, ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.admin_name}. Codes have been generated and are ready for distribution.

`+ `You can access them through our portal
`+ `${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_link}

`+ `Once you have downloaded the reward links, you can send them across to the intended recipients to recognize and motivate them for their outstanding contributions, efforts, or achievements.

`+ `Best regards,

`+ `Team ShakePe` mailSubject=`Approval of Your Codes` break; case 6: mailText=`Dear ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.requester_name},

`+ `We regret to inform you that your request has been reviewed by ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.admin_name}, and unfortunately, it has been declined.

`+ `Comments: ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.admin_comments}

`+ `If you have any questions or would like to discuss the feedback in more detail, please reach out to ${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.admin_name}.

`+ ` Best regards,

`+ `Team ShakePe` mailSubject=`Decline of New Codes Request (${$node["Webhook"].json.body.trigger.body.config.request_id})` break; default: break; } items[0].json.mailText = mailText; items[0].json.mailSubject= mailSubject; return items;
